1: Ri Ajawaxel quebuc'ulelaj ri pajbal ri man e tz'akat taj, are c'u sibalaj quekaj ri pajbal chuwäch ri e tz'akat.
2: Ri nimarisan ib cuc'am ulok esbal q'uixbal; ri no'j cäc'oji' cuc' ri e mach'amoj.
3: Ri e colomalaj tak winak cäc'am qui be rumal ri qui colomal; ri winak ri xak e u cawäch cäsach na qui wäch rumal ri qui cawächil.
4: Man c'o ta cäquipatanij na ri k'inomal pa ri k'ij re ri k'atan tzij, are c'u ri suq'uilal cuto'tajisaj ri winak pa u k'ab ri cämical.
5: Ri suq'uilal cucolomaj ri u be ri suc', are' c'u ri banal etzelal cätzak rumal ri kas retzelal.
6: Ri suq'uilal quebutor ri winak ri e colom, are c'u ri quiäk rayinic quebuxim ri jachinelab ri quieb qui wäch.
7: Aretak cäcäm ri banal etzelal, quecäm ri eyebal tak u c'u'x ruc' xukuje' tak ri e u chomam qui banic.
8: Ri Dios cäresaj ri suc' pa ri rikoj c'ax, are c'u cuya' can ri banal etzelal pa ri u c'olbal.
9: Ri e u tzij ri banal etzelal cusachisaj qui wäch ri rajil u tz'akat, are c'u ri u c'oxomanic ri suc' queto'tajisanic.
10: Aretak ri e suc' quebel puwi' ri cäquibano ri tinimit cäjajatic; aretak quecäm ri banal tak etzelal, quech'oplin che quicotemal.
11: Rumal ri tewichi'nic ri suc' cayactaj jun nimalaj tinimit; rumal c'ut ri cak' ri e banal tak etzelal cayojitajic.
12: Ri man utz ta u chomabal cubij lawaloyil chrij ri rachil; ri utz u chomabal man c'o ta jas cubij.
13: Ri biltzijtal ronojel cutzijoj, ri cuk'il rib man cach'aw taj.
14: We man c'o utzalaj k'atan tzij cätzak na ri tinimit; ri u to'tajic cäriktaj cumal ri e q'ui ya'l tak no'j.
15: Man utz ta quelic aretak cäch'aw jun puwi' jun winak ri man reta'm ta u wäch; ri man cäch'aw ta puwi' jun chic man c'o ta latz' curiko.
16: Ri ixok ri sibalaj je'l ri u c'aslemal cäya' u k'ij, ri winak ri chajil anima' curik k'inomal.
17: Ri quel u c'u'x che jun chic cuban utzil chbil rib, are c'u ri man cätok'obisan ta wächaj cuc'am ulok etzelal puwi' chbil rib.
18: Ri banal etzelal cuc'am jun tojbal ri xa subunel; ri cuban suq'uil amak'el, jic ri tojbal rech cäya'ic.
19: Ri benam chrij ri suq'uilal cäc'aman bic pa ri c'aslemal, are c'u ri benam chrij ri etzelal cäc'aman bic pa ri cämical.
20: Ri Ajawaxel cäretzelaj qui wäch ri winak ri itzel quechomanic, e are c'ut ri cuc'am jun c'aslemal ri man c'o ta jas cak'abax chrij e are' wa' ri quekaj chuwäch.
21: Ri banal etzelal cukajbej wi ri c'äjisabal u wäch, e are tak c'ut ri e suc' man c'o ta cäquikajbej.
22: Mulk'ab re k'an puak chutza'm ak ri je'lalaj ixok ri man utz ta cächomanic.
23: Ri qui rayinic ri suc' amak'el utz quelic; ri caquirayij ri e banal tak etzelal are' ri c'ananem.
24: C'o winak ri man cäq'ueq'uen taj ri nim na ri cuc'am chuwäch ri cuyao, winak c'ut ri xu'y ri u q'uisic pa ri mebayil.
25: Ri yanel cäpax u wäch ri jastak rech; ri cäyanic, xukuje' cäc'amanic.
26: Ri cuc'ol ri trico cäc'okox cumal ri winak; ri cuya' pa c'ayixic, cätewichi'x cumal.
27: Ri amak'el cuban utzil, utz cailic; ri cutakej u banic ri etzelal itzel quel na.
28: Ri cujiquiba' u c'u'x chrij ri u k'inomal, je cux na jacha' ri chaki'j u xak che' are' c'u ri e suc' queraxar na jacha' ri e u k'ab tak che'.
29: Ri man cärilij taj ri rachoch, man c'o ta jas ri cäcanaj ta ruc'; ri man c'o ta u no'j amak'el cux u lok'om pataninel ri c'o u no'j.
30: Ri suq'uilal cuya' c'aslemal, ri tokinic cäresaj.
31: We ri suc' cuc'am ri tojbal rech waral cho ri uwächulew, ¡e ta c'u na lo ri banal etzelal xukuje' ri ajmac!
